probability_assessment.your_adjusted_view: No adjustments needed; the current probabilities reflect the market sentiment accurately.

ev_interpretation: -6.44% EV is not enough to justify a position as it indicates a negative expected return on investment.
rr_interpretation: 0.36:1 R/R is not acceptable because the downside risk significantly outweighs the potential upside.
reasoning: Given the negative expected value and unfavorable risk/reward ratio, it is prudent to avoid any investment in TSLA at this time. The significant downside risks and current market conditions further support this stance.
vs_research_manager: While I agree with the recommendation to sell, I emphasize a neutral stance of avoiding any position rather than actively selling, as the current metrics do not support a bullish outlook.
